statements: SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, category FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT date, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM expenses ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT id, category, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries' AND amount BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND description LIKE '%tax%'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM expenses
SELECT * FROM transportation_expenses;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM accommodation_expenses;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM transportation_expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_expenses WHERE date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT id, date FROM transportation_expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM accommodation_expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, amount FROM transportation_expenses ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_expenses WHERE amount < 500 OR amount > 2000;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM transportation_expenses;
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount FROM accommodation WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT description FROM transportation WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM food WHERE restaurant = 'McDonalds';
SELECT date, location FROM accommodation WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM accommodation WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM food WHERE restaurant = 'Italian Cuisine' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, location FROM accommodation JOIN transportation ON accommodation.id = transportation.id;
SELECT food.restaurant, SUM(food.amount) AS total_amount FROM food GROUP BY food.restaurant HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation;
SELECT date, category, amount FROM transportation;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM transportation WHERE category = 'Travel';
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM transportation;
SELECT date, MAX(amount) FROM transportation GROUP BY date;
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) FROM transportation GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM accommodation WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT meal_type, cost FROM food WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND date <= '2021-06-30';
SELECT id, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transportation
SELECT amount, description FROM Accommodation WHERE date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT date, amount, description FROM Food ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT category, amount FROM OtherExpenses WHERE category = 'Office Supplies'
SELECT budget_id, category, amount FROM TravelBudget
SELECT * FROM Transportation ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT description, amount FROM Accommodation WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM Food GROUP BY date;
SELECT * FROM OtherExpenses WHERE category = 'Office Supplies' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TravelBudget GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
